is a community of organic farms about 30 km northeast of
To get to Miraflor, you may take the bus from Esteli to Yali at the Cotran Norte Bus Terminal. Buses leave at 06:00, 12:00, and 15:40 for NIO20.
Buses between Yali and Esteli pass through the park, ask locals for times.  Hitchhiking and horseback riding are also options.

value: content=In the brilliant cloud forest of Esteli is environmentally friendly and fully sustainable. The farm is 100% solar and a wood burning and bio-gas kitchen. They harvest their own organic food and have crystal clear water pulled from a bicycle-driven well. In addition there are private cabins, a large bed, warm down comforters, and solar hot showers. Also included in a day are three delicious (many vegetarian options) meals with organic refreshments and homegrown coffee.
directions=Bus from Estelí to Yalí at terminal Cotran Norte. Stop at La Rampla. Walk 1.5 km toward the community El Cebollal following signs to Posada La Soñada
price=USD17-20 (bunks / cabins) including 3 meals and drinks

content=Doña Corina's place is a haven of quiet. The home-made food is simply a delight. You can walk on a self-guided trail around the farm and watch colibris. There is even a new tree-house to sleep with the birds at about 8m high.

Buses leave at 07:15, 11:30 and 16:15 from Mirafor toward
. The trip is about 1 hour 15 minutes.
